project_descr: Preparatory Assistance for Promoting V4D in Europe and the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS)

outputs.output_title: PA for V4D in EU and CIS
outputs.output_descr:
The project "Preparatory Assistance for Promoting Volunteerism for Development (V4D) in Europe and CIS" aims to analyse opportunities for UNV outreach to UNDP practice/country offices and potential partners in the regional context and to catalyse a broader debate between various partners (VIOs, governments, CBOs, UN system etc.) on the value of volunteerism in development activities.

The project includes both an assessment exercise and the implementation of preparatory activities that would capitalise on UNV country-level experience and initiate a broader debate for identifying sub-regional/ regional trends, synergies and cross-linkages that would eventually guide the development of an integrated and multi-partner supported regional programme for Europe and the CIS. The project will achieve the pre-set objectives through addressing the following five components: 
1.) Stocktaking of the state of volunteerism in the region
2.) Integration of volunteer-based approaches into development programming and highlighting relevant sub-regional and/ or regional lessons
3.) Refining volunteer approaches in the four thematic areas for UNV involvement and support in Europe and CIS
4.) Development of strategic partnerships
5.) Advocacy and knowledge management
6.) Regional programme formulation
